issue.title: [R] Bindings for stringr::str_extract/str_extract_all ~ "extract_regex" kernel
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13875](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13875). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Implementing this may need to make use of the `list_flatten` kernel too (and maybe others?), as this kernel returns a struct.
